trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs> is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> event.
trans-unit.target: Экземпляр <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs> создается, когда <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> объекта вызывает <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> событий.

trans-unit.source: To obtain the identity of the new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A>, access the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A> property in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Чтобы получить идентификатор нового <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A>, доступ <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A> свойство в обработчике для события.

trans-unit.source: You can change the voice in use by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Вы можете изменить голос в используется <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> с любым из <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> методы или <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> или <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> методы.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo" /> object of the new voice.
Returns information that describes and identifies the new voice.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает сведения, описывающие и определяющие новый голос.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A> property gets the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> object when a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> event is raised.
